content: twiddle muffs two ways by lesley johnson dhkg dallas hand knitter s guild 2023-2024 guild year charity knit is for alzheimer s and dementia patients this is a basic body of the muff it has different textures that are easy and quick for any skill set of knitter you need to know how to cast on knit and purl the pattern is written to be knitted in the round if you would like to knit this pattern flat directions will be provided at the end either way the pattern will be knit from end to end please feel free to modify this pattern to suit your creativity by using different colors or add different stitches but please do not profit from this that s just wrong i ve broken down the sections of texture tools needle size us 8 - 16 in circs for in the round or larger cable for flat yarn heavy worsted or chunky 100 g total - yarn needle - stitch markers - crochet hook - buttons or other little trinkets to decorate your finished muff abbreviations eor = end of round or end of row k = knit p = purl video resources provided by very pink knits long tail cast on https //youtu be/sn9cneozolc elastic bind off 2x2 ribbing https //youtu be/sbzeeg6xmwm mattress stitch https //youtu be/46iuyefckxa 1 | pa ge twiddle muffs two ways by lesley johnson knit in the round cast on 52 stitches using the long tail garter cast on rounds 85 purl join to work in the round round 86 knit ribbing round 87 purl rounds 1-10 k2 p2 to eor round 88 knit garter round 89 purl round 11 knit round 90 knit round 12 purl ribbing rounds 13 15 and 17 knit rounds 91-101 k2 p2 to eor rounds 14 16 and 18 purl bind off with the elastic bind off welt rounds 19 23 knit rounds 24 28 purl stockinette rounds 29 49 knit reverse stockinette rounds 50 52 purl stockinette rounds 53 73 knit welt rounds 74-79 purl rounds 80-84 knit 2 | pa ge twiddle muffs two ways by lesley johnson knit it flat cast on 52 stitches using the long tail stockinette cast on row 55 knit ribbing row 56 purl row 1-10 k2 p2 to eor row 57 76 repeat row 55 and 56 garter welt row 11-18 knit row 77 knit welt row 78 purl row 19 knit row 79 knit row 20 purl row 80 purl row 21 knit row 81 knit row 22 purl row 82 knit row 23 knit row 83 purl row 24 knit row 84 knit row 25 purl row 85 purl row 26 knit row 86 knit row 27 purl garter row 28 knit row 87-96 knit stockinette ribbing row 29 knit row 97-107 k2 p2 to the end of row row 30 purl leave a long tail and sew the long edges row 31 50 repeat row 29 and 30 together using a mattress stitch
